alert.note: Alert for Bryan; Chatham (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 08 at 7:58PM EDT until June 08 at 8:30PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM EDT FOR PORTIONS OF BRYAN...CHATHAM AND JASPER COUNTIES... At 757 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Hunter Army Airfield, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. Locations impacted include: Pooler, Tybee Island, Wilmington Island, Fort Pulaski National Monument, Midtown Savannah, Downtown Savannah, Coffee Bluff, I-16/I-95 Interchange, Hunter Army Airfield, Savannah International Airport, Montgomery, Garden City, Thunderbolt, Vernonburg, and Isle Of Hope. This warning includes the following interstates: I-16 between mile markers 158 and 168. I-516 between mile markers 3 and 9. I-95 in Georgia between mile markers 97 and 102. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Prepare immediately for large hail and deadly cloud to ground lightning. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure. Stay away from windows. Report damage directly to the Charleston National Weather Service at 888-383-2024 when it is safe to do so.
